on reading compounds: 夢中【ムチュウ】absorbed in, immersed in, crazy about, obsessed with, devoted to, forgetting oneself, daze, trance, ecstasy, delirium, within a dream, while dreaming
同床異夢【ドウショウイム】cohabiting but living in different worlds
kun reading compounds: 夢にも【ゆめにも】(not) in the slightest, (not) at all
初夢【はつゆめ】year's first dream
逆夢【さかゆめ】a dream which is contradicted by reality
